# ProjectForecaster
Forecast probabilities of a project's effort and duration using **Monte Carlo simulations**.  This version is adapted from Rodrigo Rosauro's MIT project on Github.  It uses triangular distribution in preference to uniform distribution across the range used by the simulations.  This should make it more accurate.

Public-facing URL: https://random11235.github.io/forecaster

* [Documentation and user-manual](https://github.com/rodrigozr/ProjectForecaster/wiki)
* [Sample project](https://rodrigozr.github.io/ProjectForecaster/#) (pre-filled with test data)
